character.statement: I'll need your help once I get this set up. You should go meet the other passengers while you're waiting.
I'm going to unveil an incredible new device. It actually captures moving pictures! Let's try it out.
It's working! Wait here, I've got to go find that New York Times reporter!
*gasp* My machine! What have you done with it?
My invention - stolen! The thief can't have gone far...
I don't know what happened to it! It was here when the lights went out, and then...
